title: JSON schema for the Stylelint configuration files

___function-whitelist.description: Specify a whitelist of allowed functions

___function-calc-no-unspaced-operator.description: Disallow an unspaced operator within `calc` functions

___function-comma-newline-after.description: Require a newline or disallow whitespace after the commas of functions

___function-url-scheme-whitelist.description: Specify a whitelist of allowed url schemes

___function-whitespace-after.description: Require or disallow whitespace after functions

___function-parentheses-space-inside.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace on the inside of the parentheses of functions

___function-linear-gradient-no-nonstanda.description: Disallow direction values in `linear-gradient()` calls that are not valid according to the standard syntax

___function-url-quotes.description: Require or disallow quotes for urls

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___function-name-case.description: Specify lowercase or uppercase for function names

___function-comma-space-before.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace before the commas of functions

___function-comma-space-after.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace after the commas of functions

___function-max-empty-lines.description: Limit the number of adjacent empty lines within functions

___function-blacklist.description: Specify a blacklist of disallowed functions

___function-parentheses-newline-inside.description: Require a newline or disallow whitespace on the inside of the parentheses of functions

___function-comma-newline-before.description: Require a newline or disallow whitespace before the commas of functions

___function-url-data-uris.description: Require or disallow data URIs for urls

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___checkPrefixed.description: If `true`, this rule will check vendor-prefixed properties

___property-whitelist.description: Specify a whitelist of allowed properties

___property-case.description: Specify lowercase or uppercase for properties

___property-blacklist.description: Specify a blacklist of disallowed properties

___comment-word-blacklist.description: Specify a blacklist of disallowed words within comments

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___ignore.description: Don't require an empty line between comments

___except.description: Reverse the primary option for comments that are nested and the first child of their parent node

___comment-empty-line-before.description: Require or disallow an empty line before comments

___comment-whitespace-inside.description: Require or disallow whitespace on the inside of comment markers

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___color-named.description: Require (where possible) or disallow named colors

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___color-hex-length.description: Specify short or long notation for hex colors

___color-hex-case.description: Specify lowercase or uppercase for hex colors

___declaration-block-semicolon-newline-b.description: Require a newline or disallow whitespace before the semicolons of declaration blocks

___declaration-block-trailing-semicolon.description: Require or disallow a trailing semicolon within declaration blocks

___declaration-block-semicolon-space-bef.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace before the semicolons of declaration blocks

___declaration-block-single-line-max-dec.description: Limit the number of declaration within a single line declaration block

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___unspecified.description: These options only apply if you've defined your own array of properties

___declaration-block-properties-order.description: Specify the order of properties within declaration blocks

___declaration-block-semicolon-space-aft.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace after the semicolons of declaration blocks

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___declaration-block-no-duplicate-proper.description: Disallow duplicate properties within declaration blocks

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___declaration-block-no-redundant-longha.description: Disallow longhand properties that can be combined into one shorthand property

___declaration-block-no-ignored-properti.description: Disallow property values that are ignored due to another property value in the same rule

___declaration-block-semicolon-newline-a.description: Require a newline or disallow whitespace after the semicolons of declaration blocks

___declaration-block-no-shorthand-proper.description: Disallow shorthand properties that override related longhand properties

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___declaration-bang-space-after.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace after the bang of declarations

___selector-pseudo-class-whitelist.description: Specify a whitelist of allowed pseudo-class selectors

___selector-attribute-operator-blacklist.description: Specify a blacklist of disallowed attribute operators

___selector-nested-pattern.description: Specify a pattern for the selectors of rules nested within rules

___selector-combinator-space-before.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace before the combinators of selectors

___selector-pseudo-class-parentheses-spa.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace on the inside of the parentheses within pseudo-class selectors

___selector-combinator-space-after.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace after the combinators of selectors

___selector-attribute-brackets-space-ins.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace on the inside of the brackets within attribute selector

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___selector-root-no-composition.description: Disallow the composition of :root in selectors

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___resolveNestedSelectors.description: This option will resolve nested selectors with `&` interpolation

___selector-class-pattern.description: Specify a pattern for class selectors

___selector-attribute-operator-space-bef.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace before operators within attribute selectors

___selector-attribute-operator-space-aft.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace after operators within attribute selectors

___selector-attribute-quotes.description: Require or disallow quotes for attribute values

___selector-pseudo-class-case.description: Specify lowercase or uppercase for pseudo-class selectors

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___selector-no-qualifying-type.description: Disallow qualifying a selector by type

___selector-id-pattern.description: Specify a pattern for id selectors

___selector-pseudo-element-colon-notatio.description: Specify single or double colon notation for applicable pseudo-elements

___selector-max-compound-selectors.description: Limit the number of compound selectors in a selector

___selector-descendant-combinator-no-non.description: Disallow non-space characters for descendant combinators of selectors

___selector-max-empty-lines.description: Limit the number of adjacent empty lines within selectors

___selector-attribute-operator-whitelist.description: Specify a whitelist of allowed attribute operators

___selector-pseudo-element-case.description: Specify lowercase or uppercase for pseudo-element selectors

___no-unknown-animations.description: Disallow animation names that do not correspond to a `@keyframes` declaration

___no-invalid-double-slash-comments.description: Disallow double-slash comments `(//...)` which are not supported by CSS and could lead to unexpected results

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___no-browser-hacks.description: Disallow browser hacks that are irrelevant to the browsers you are targeting

___no-descending-specificity.description: Disallow selectors of lower specificity from coming after overriding selectors of higher specificity

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___no-unsupported-browser-features.description: Disallow features that are unsupported by the browsers that you are targeting

___max-empty-lines.description: Limit the number of adjacent empty lines

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___whitelist.description: An array of color pairs to ignore. Each pair is an array with two items

___no-indistinguishable-colors.description: Disallow colors that are suspiciously close to being identical

___no-duplicate-selectors.description: Disallow duplicate selectors within a stylesheet

___message.description: Custom message that will be used in errors and warnings

___indentInsideParens.description: If `true`, the closing brace of a block (rule or at-rule) will be expected at the same indentation level as the block's inner nodes

___selector-pseudo-element-case.description: Specify lowercase or uppercase for pseudo-element selectors

___selector-type-case.description: Specify lowercase or uppercase for type selectors

___selector-list-comma-space-before.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace before the commas of selector lists

___selector-list-comma-newline-after.description: Require a newline or disallow whitespace after the commas of selector lists

___selector-list-comma-space-after.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace after the commas of selector lists

___selector-list-comma-newline-before.description: Require a newline or disallow whitespace before the commas of selector lists

___shorthand-property-no-redundant-value.description: Disallow redundant values in shorthand properties

___string-quotes.description: Specify single or double quotes around strings

___stylelint-disable-reason.description: Require a reason comment before or after `stylelint-disable` comments

___time-no-imperceptible.description: Disallow `animation` and `transition` less than or equal to 100ms

___unit-case.description: Specify lowercase or uppercase for units

___unit-blacklist.description: Specify a blacklist of disallowed units

___unit-whitelist.description: Specify a whitelist of allowed units

___value-keyword-case.description: Specify lowercase or uppercase for keywords values

___value-list-comma-space-after.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace after the commas of value lists

___value-list-comma-newline-after.description: Require a newline or disallow whitespace after the commas of value lists

___value-list-comma-newline-before.description: Require a newline or disallow whitespace before the commas of value lists

___value-list-comma-space-before.description: Require a single space or disallow whitespace before the commas of value lists

___value-list-max-empty-lines.description: Limit the number of adjacent empty lines within value lists

___processors.description: Processors are functions that hook into stylelint's pipeline, modifying code on its way into stylelint and modifying results on their way out

___extends.description: Your configuration can extend an existing configuration(s) (whether your own or a third-party config)

___defaultSeverity.description: The default severity level for all rules that do not have a severity specified in their secondary options

___plugins.description: Plugins are rules or sets of rules built by the community that support methodologies, toolsets, non-standard CSS features, or very specific use cases

___ignoreFiles.description: Provide a glob or array of globs to ignore specific files
